scripts.dev: npm run cleanCache && NETWORK=testrpc node fuse
scripts.migrateTestnet: cd customModules/protocol && NETWORK=testnet truffle migrate --network kovanInfura
scripts.prod: npm run cleanCache && NODE_ENV=production node fuse
scripts.testProtocol: cd customModules/protocol/test && tsc && cd ../build/tests/test && NETWORK=testrpc TEST=true truffle test *.js
scripts.testProtocol1: cd customModules/protocol/test && tsc && cd ../build/tests/test && NETWORK=testrpc TEST=true truffle test
scripts.testProtocolTestnet: cd customModules/protocol/test && tsc && cd ../build/tests/test && NETWORK=testnet TEST=true truffle test *.js --network kovanInfura
scripts.testProtocolTestnet1: cd customModules/protocol/test && tsc && cd ../build/tests/test && NETWORK=testnet TEST=true truffle test --network kovanInfura
